languages.text: "Мне... Что?! Ваша Светлость, я серьезно должен оправдываться после обвинений этого... Я даже не знаю, кто это! Это... Это же я. Я жизнью рисковал за вас и этот корабль больше раз, чем эта гроксова отрыжка слышала сирену вахтенной смены".

"Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."
languages.original_text: "Мне... Что?! Ваша Светлость, я серьезно должен оправдываться после обвинений этого... Я даже не знаю, кто это! Это... Это же я. Я жизнью рисковал за вас и этот корабль больше раз, чем эта гроксова отрыжка слышала сирену вахтенной смены".

traits.locale_text: "I... What?! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I seriously have to defend myself after the accusations of this... I do not even know who he is! It's... It's me. I've risked my life and limb for you and this ship more often than that little twerp has heard the watch siren."

"I... What?! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I seriously have to defend myself after the accusations of this... I do not even know who he is! It's... It's me. I've risked my life and limb for you and this ship more often than that little twerp has heard the watch siren."

"I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I truly have to defend myself after being accused by this... I do not even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more often than that little twerp has heard the watch siren."

"I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I truly have to defend myself after being accused by this... I do not even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more often than that little twerp has heard the watch siren."

"Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

"Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

languages.text: «¿Que si...? ¿Perdón? Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿de verdad tengo que defenderme de la acusación de este...? ¡Ni siquiera sé quién es! Soy... soy yo. He arriesgado mi vida por usted y esta nave más veces de las que ese vómito de grox ha oído la sirena de la guardia».
languages.original_text: "Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que si...? ¿Perdón? Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿de verdad tengo que defenderme de la acusación de este...? ¡Ni siquiera sé quién es! Soy... soy yo. He arriesgado mi vida por usted y esta nave más veces de las que ese crío ha oído la sirena de la guardia».

languages.text: 「私が…えっ？陛下、本当にあんな告発の弁護をしなければいけませんか…あの男が何者かも知らないのですよ！わ…私ですよ。私は、あのクズが警報を聞いた回数よりも多く、あなたやこの船のために命を懸けてきたのですよ」
languages.original_text: "Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

traits.locale_text: 「私が…えっ？陛下、本当にあんな告発の弁護をしなければいけませんか…あの男が何者かも知らないのですよ！…私です。私が危険を冒してでもあなたやこの船のために、あのバカが監視のサイレンを聞くより何倍も早く駆けつけたのですよ」

languages.text: “我……什么？舰长大人，我真的要为我自己辩护吗。这个……我甚至根本不知道这个家伙是谁！我……我为您和这艘船冒生命危险的次数，比这个小王八蛋听警笛的次数还要多。”
languages.original_text: "Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

traits.locale_text: “我……什么？舰长大人，难道我真的需要为我自己辩护吗。这个……我甚至根本不知道这家伙是谁！我……我为您和这艘船冒生命危险的次数，比这个小叛徒听警笛的次数还要多。”

languages.text: "Ob ich ... Was? Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, muss ich mich wirklich gegen Vorwürfe verteidigen, die dieser ... Ich weiß nicht einmal, wer er ist! Ich ... ich bin es doch. Ich habe für Euch und dieses Schiff öfter Leib und Leben riskiert, als dieser Groxkotzer die Wachsirene gehört hat."
languages.original_text: "Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

traits.locale_text: "Ob ich ... Was? Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, muss ich mich wirklich gegen Vorwürfe verteidigen, die dieser ... Ich weiß nicht einmal, wer er ist! Ich ... ich bin es doch. Ich habe für Euch und dieses Schiff öfter Leib und Leben riskiert, als dieser kleine Eumel die Wachsirene gehört hat."

languages.text: « Si j'ai... Quoi ? Votre Seigneurie, je dois sérieusement me défendre des accusations de ce... Je sais même pas qui c'est, ce gars ! C'est... c'est moi. J'ai risqué ma vie et chaque centimètre carré de mon corps pour vous et ce vaisseau bien plus de fois que ce petit fils de grox n'a entendu de sirène. »
languages.original_text: "Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'ai... Quoi ? Votre Seigneurie, je dois sérieusement me défendre des accusations de ce... Je sais même pas qui c'est, ce gars ! C'est... c'est moi. J'ai risqué ma vie et chaque centimètre carré de mon corps pour vous et ce vaisseau bien plus de fois que ce petit con n'a entendu de sirène. »

languages.text: "Ben... Ne? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, böyle bir suçlama karşısında kendimi gerçekten savunmam gerekiyor mu? Onun kim olduğunu bile bilmiyorum! Karşınızdaki... Benim. Sizin için de bu gemi için de yaşamımı ve uzuvlarımı defalarca tehlikeye attım. Şu groks kusmuğu, vardiya sirenini o kadar duymamıştır."
languages.original_text: "Do I... What? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do I really have to defend myself after being accused by this... I don't even know who he is! It's... It's me. I have risked life and limb for you and this ship more times than that groxchunder has heard the watch siren."
